text: Anyone else having issues with newly published pages not being not showing up on Google's index?
Wondering if HubSpot has issues, because pages used to be automatically indexed

Hi Bantu for pages to automatically be indexed Google has to find the pages. Easiest way to do that is a sitemap in Google Search Console. If that has been done I would check and see if the pages you are referencing are in it. You can also request indexing in Google Search Console.
Should I add an H ref Lang tag to a page of which that I donâ€™t have a localized copy version of it?
Is it a landing page or a website page? Landing pages don't automatically get added to your sitemap but website pages do.

<@U028QUKCW31> Google these days takes its own time to index new websites. For faster indexing, make sure you have submitted them to index via GSC, and pages have high quality unique and relevant content with enough social proof and authority. Thanks.
